document.title: Wel Sample: Standard Dialogs
document.paragraph:
stddlgs.png stddlgs
2Compiling
To compile the example:
Start Visual Studio .NET
Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Navigate to <EiffelEnvision_installation_path>\envision\examples\wel\stddlg\ and select stddlg_demo.eifp
Clicking open loads the selected project
Launch EiffelStudio.
Click Add project
Browse to $ISE_EIFFEL\examples\wel\stddlgs\.
Choose stddlgs.ecf
Choose the location where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the configuration file.
Click OK.
2Running After launching the program, a window will displayed with a menu allowing you to select some of the standard dialogs provided by WEL.
2Under the Hood on_menu_command has been redefined in MAIN_WINDOW to display a different standard dialog when each of the menu items is selected. This sample contains the following classes:
APPLICATION_IDS
MAIN_WINDOW
STDDLG_DEMO
